Alex Wagner

Technical Writer and Full-Stack Web Developer

Hi, I’m Alex. I’m a technical content strategist and full-stack web developer based in Brooklyn, New York.

I’m currently working as a technical writer at a small startup that’s in stealth.

For the past three years, I’ve been working in web3/crypto, mostly in product marketing, content, and technical writing roles. See my writing portfolio here.

As a full-stack web developer, I have experience in JavaScript, Typescript, React, Node.js, Next.js, MySQL, Django, Solidity, Ruby on Rails, and p5.js.

Here’s a couple of things that I’m “building in public” right now:

  • Art-archive: A webapp that allows you to upload and store images of your artwork and research materials, and then view them in a gallery. Built with React, Typescript, Node.js, and Django.

  • Things That Should Exist: A newsletter about belonging, collective power, and a sort-of journal for things I’ve been working on. Read it here.

  • CodeFriends: A mentorship platform for developers. CodeFriends allows you to connect with mentors and peers who can help you learn to code, as well as navigate the process of finding a job. Built with React, Next.js, TailwindCSS.

I am currently looking for fully-remote opportunities as a technical writer, UX writer, or full-stack web developer.
